name: docker-practice
description: <!--      //create directory     mkdir docker-practice     //npm initialization     npm init -y     //install dependency express      npm i express     //docker build a container using Dockerfile      docker build -t node-app-image .     //show all image      docker image ls     //run container on a specific port      docker run -p 3000:3000 -d  --name node-app  node-app-image     //show container     docker ps     //remove a container      docker rm node-app -f     //open container directory      docker exec -it node-app bash  -->
